title: league is not responding?
body: So I was in a league ranked champion select and out of nowhere it just says " league is not working " or something and it made me close the client and I lost 3 lp and had to wait 5 minutes what is this?!!?

replies.body:
The "Application is not responding" message in champ select is often a result of your client disconnecting from the servers entirely. Most of the time, this is caused by any number of local network settings that can conflict with League. I strongly recommend taking the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps helped at all.
